title: Tactical Gaming is Recruiting

embed.description: Welcome to Tactical Gaming Register now to join our community of like minded gamers. TG consists of active gamers which have a "real life first" mindset. We aim to satisfy our member's needs for team based gaming by having our Tactical Warfare franchise for warfare based games and our Tactical Sports franchise for sports based games.

body:
Hello! Tactical Gaming is currently recruiting members!

Tactical Gaming (TG) was created in November 2004 to bring together like-minded gamers from around the globe and from multiple platforms (Consoles, PC & Mobile), to provide them Head Quarters (web site) where they can share their backgrounds, experience, and interests in teamwork and tactics, as well as providing them with an environment that allows a “friends-first” experience in the online community.

What we believe
We believe that regardless of origin, nationality, age, gender, race, religious beliefs or creed, disrespectful behavior towards one another is unacceptable. The same belief is applied to gaming. With the notion that so many people share the common passion for video games, the vision and mission is to bring together like-minded gamers from around the globe and from multiple platforms, to provide them head quarters (web site) where they could share their backgrounds, experience, and interests in teamwork and tactics, as well as providing them with an environment that allows a “friends-first” experience.

Squads
Tactical Gaming is different from other communities because we offer Squads! Instead of finding people, you will be placed with people of your skill level. You will be placed with 4+ other members (including a leader) getting better at mechanics, teamwork, call outs, etc.
In these squads, you will have 2 mandatory practices. These practices will be held at 6pm on Sundays and Wednesdays (will vary depending on state or if from NZ). If you feel like the team needs more practice then ask the leader for some optionals.

Leaders of TG know that we all have lives outside of League so please keep in mind to tell your leaders that you can't attend a practice. 6 AWOLS or 3 consecutive AWOLS will result in an automatic discharge. AWOLS are also permanent.
What we offer
Teamspeak Server
Squad with people around your skill level/tier
Forum
Ranking system
Multiple gaming divisions
Practices will be at 6pm (may vary) every Wednesday and Sunday.

How to Join:
Simply click the following link to register
http://www.tacticalgaming.net/hq/index.php?app=referrals&reff=25844
You should receive an email within 2 days if you have been approved, then follow instructions to complete your boot camp. After that you will be assigned to a squad and will be ready to start playing! By the way for LoL OCE put down 1st battalion, not 2nd. Also if you have registered please reply here stating that you have done so.

Headquarters: http://www.TacticalGaming.net
About us: http://www.tacticalgaming.net/hq/news/tactical-gaming-history
Why TG?: http://www.tacticalgaming.net/hq/news/about-tactical-gaming
